bAddEle.description: Increase physical damage by {1} against {0} enemies when using {2} and dealing {3} damage.

bSubEle.description: Reduce physical damage by {1} from {0} enemies when receiving {3} damage from {2}.

bAddEff.description: Add a {1} chance to inflict {0} on {2} when dealing {3} damage.

bAutoSpell.description: Add a {2} chance to cast {0} of level {1} on each normal attack.

bAutoSpellWhenHit.description: Add a {2} chance to cast {0} of level {1} from each normal attack.

bSPVanishRaceRate.description: Add a {1} chance of decreasing {0} eies' SP by {2} on each normal attack.

bStateNoRecoverRace.description: Add a {1} chance of disabling HP and SP recovery of {0} enemies for {2} on each normal attack.
